mapper.insert: INSERT INTO daegu_hotel_info (h_shop, h_tel, h_address, h_offer, h_facilities, h_tag) VALUES (#{h_shop}, #{h_tel}, #{h_address}, #{h_offer}, #{h_facilities}, #{h_tag});
insert into hotel_image (himg_file_name, himg_uri, himg_size) values (#{himg_file_name}, #{himg_uri}, #{himg_size});
mapper.select: select himg_file_name from hotel_image where himg_uri=#{uri} order by himg_seq desc limit 1
